src_original: punarbhavam iti khyātaṃ pratibhāsopamaṃ hi tat // Nś_5_[1] //
tadvat paśyati rūpāṇi karmabhir nirmitaṃ jagat // Nś_6_[2] //  dharmaṃ deśayataḥ śabdā ye kecit śrutigocarāḥ /
āghrataṃ svāditaṃ tathā spraṣṭaṃ viṣayalālāsaiḥ /  svapnatulyam idaṃ sarvam upalabdhaṃ na vidyate // Nś_8_[4] //  māyāyantro naro yadvad bhinnāṃ ceṣṭāṃ karoti vai /
tenārthato navaślokāś cintanīyāḥ samāsataḥ // Nś_4 //  karmaprabhāvasaṃbhūtaṃ ṣaḍāyatanalakṣaṇam /
